name: Surveilance Defence
description:
This game is 4 Players and requires at least two moniters that are the same size. You are unable to play with less or more than 4 players. The objective of the game is for all of the theives to steal as much as they can before they are stopped by the security guard.

Game Requirements

  • 4 Controllers
  • 2 Monitors

Known Bugs

  • Some camera's may not work
  • Replaying game may break the game
  • Player animations do not work
  • Thief hearts may not be consitant with actual theif health
  • Theif staminia may not be accurate
